entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , L'Anse-au-Loup
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:32 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -7.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Blanc-Sablon Airport 12:00 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -7.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -8.4°C
Wind: ENE 20 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 16 this evening. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and blowing snow beginning in the morning then changing to ice pellets in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 15 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to plus 2 in the evening then falling. POP 60%
entry.summary: Ice pellets changing to drizzle and ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the evening. Temperature rising to plus 2 in the evening then falling. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
